questions.quote: If I wind up sitting next to Uncle Leo, I am leaving. He's always grabbing my arm when he talks to me. I guess it's because so many people have left in the middle of his conversation.
He'll always be criticizing your brushing technique, it'll drive you crazy.  Away from the gums...
Jerry, could you do me a personal favor? And if I'm out of line, *please*, let me know. Could I keep my trench coat in your closet for a few months?
Oh, ho ha ha. No, no, I'm actually here to bid, Sue Ellen. I mean that is if anything is to my liking.
Good. And I'll tell you what... You don't have to pay me back the thirty-five I gave to the chiropractor for the rest of your bill.
Yeah, yeah... Hey, Jerry, would you like anything from Mrs. Hudwalker's apartment?
I did. I'm just curious. It's been almost a week. I want to check it out.  Six points?  It's up six points!
A thousand?! I know a coupla Chinamen over there on Forty-third Street, who'll do it for half that.
Not on my watch!  I won't have you turning my office into a den of iniquity! Get your fix somewhere else!
Did you just roll your eyes at him? Because let me tell you something, if anobody should be rolling their eyes, it is me at him about you.
